0: What in the fuck was that Kanye?!
1: I told you to do some shit for the kids!
2: You can give me your muthafuckin' graduation ticket right now!
3: You will not walk across that stage, you won’t slide across that stage!
4: A muthafucka can’t pull you across that stage Kanye!
5: Who told you see, I told you to do somethin' uplifting!
6: I’m tryin' to get you out here with these white people and this how you're gonna do me!
7: You know what, you's a nigga!
8: And I don’t mean that in no nice way
9: Had little kids sing about the shit, the jokes on you
10: You throw your mutha hands in the air, and wave good-bye to everybody
11: Cause you gettin' the fuck out of this campus
12: What the fuck you gone do now
title: Graduation Day
